Medicine Details
Fill in the details below to set up your medicine reminder

💡 Tips for Better Medicine Management

  • • Set reminders 30 minutes before meal times if medicine should be taken with food
  • • Add notes about any side effects you've experienced
  • • Use specific dosage information (e.g., "500mg tablet" instead of just "1 tablet")
  • • Set end dates for antibiotics and temporary medications
